body: This one is a lot more elf-like than the one in the first chapter. Major improvement IMO.
I feel bad for that elf
Elf tag is pretty awsome.  Love the design on this one.

@jinxither: don't worry, I still have plenty I'm working on behind the scenes. I've got a pretty great selection right now that fakku doesn't have a claim on. I just avoid sharing the titles before I finish with them so I can hopefully avoid someone sniping a project I'm half-finished on or something. Besides that one work that I didn't realize fakku already translated, they haven't been an issue since then. And that one was my fault anyway since I didn't check fakku beforehand.
@Rainsong I really like it, but I can felt the limitations of works u can translate due to... well... Fakxu (Not insulting words, we all know what that one is)
Also, as an fyi, I favorite all of my releases so that they're easy to find for people. Anyone can just click my profile and see what I've worked on that way as well.
@jinxither: I'm doing great, thanks for asking! How are you doing? Enjoying the releases?

Hey all, translator here. Be sure to support the artist if you can. Link found here: https://www.dlsite.com/maniax/work/=/product_id/RJ342868.html It's literally only a buck, so please consider it. Your support helps keep them creating content like this. They're aiming for their next work to be a full-length release, so keep an eye out for them as well. They post regular updates to their twitter and pixiv.
not a fan of that tits
da joos fucked my brain up.. i need to find a way to unfuck my mind
